content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

SELECT TOP 100
*
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    )AS trip_data;

-- Cant query inside a folder that has no delta folder , because it just makes it a normal folder format

SELECT TOP 100
*
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/year=2020',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    )AS trip_data;


-- Exec for column description
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT TOP 100
*
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK ''trip_data_green_delta/'',
    DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
    FORMAT = ''DELTA''
    )AS trip_data'

-- Above data seems legit except varchar which is 8000 so we include the types with a 'with' clause

SELECT TOP 100
*
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    )
    WITH(
        VendorID INT,
        lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
        lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
        store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
        RatecodeID INT,
        PULocationID INT,
        DOLocationID INT,
        passenger_count INT,
        trip_distance FLOAT,
        fare_amount FLOAT,
        extra FLOAT,
        mta_tax FLOAT,
        tip_amount FLOAT,
        tolls_amount FLOAT,
        ehail_fee INT, 
        improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
        total_amount FLOAT,
        payment_type INT,
        trip_type INT,
        congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )
    AS trip_data;

-- Reduce columns for better performance
-- need to add the columns we partitioned year-month

SELECT TOP 100
*
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    )
    WITH(
        tip_amount FLOAT,
        trip_type INT,
        year VARCHAR(4),
        month VARCHAR(2)
    )
    AS trip_data;


SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT payment_type)
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    )
    AS trip_data;

-- Increase performance - reduce processed data scanned

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT payment_type)
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    )
    AS trip_data
WHERE year = '2020' AND month = '01';
